Title: Provides that the borough of Staten Island shall also be known and designated as the "borough of parks"
Summary: Provides that the borough of Staten Island shall also be known and designated as the "borough of parks".
LawCode: Amd ยง2-202, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to designating the borough of Staten Island as the "borough of parks"
